comments.text:
Hola Cristina,
Espero que comprendas que no recibo correos directamente, tendría que 
pasarme el día respondiendo, en lugar de atender a los animales.
Tenemos como mail de contacto a nuestra compañera lourdes@cunipic.com, ella 
me hará llegar los correos. Cuándo los escribáis, no os olvidéis de poner 
que me los hagan llegar a mi.
Un saludo.

captions.text: I was the typical boy that was always chasing all type of animals, and that I was interested
in all and every one of them.
I specialized in exotic animals,
first because I love animals by nature,
and all wild animals,
during my carrer this speciality was exotic animals in general,
so this is how I started to work with all type of animals, specializing myself with those
that were not cats and dogs but instead in all the rest.
Surgery is one of my most important specialities,
I really like traumatology in small exotic
animals,
but I always end up doing a lot soft tissue surgery
in all type of animals. It looks ok, we will have to put this piece here and this other one
here.
We have to put it in place. When we are operating these small animals,
its a lot of hard work,
and we make many pieces ourselves, precisely, this
is an external fixer, we will introduce the paw in here
to make it stay straight and we will use long rods to go through it.
Working with exotic animals, supposes a challenge,
every day we find new challenges in different situations and we have to constantly innovate.
Everything has already been studied
for cats and dogs, and
we have all the available sources,
but for exotic animals we have to use our own resources
so its
innovating and studying all day,
looking for new things, adapting
the medicine and the surgery.
With these rods, what we are doing is holding
the internal bone in place helped by
this external plastic tube,
its like a plaster, yes it does the same job as if we were using a
plaster.
Perfectly in place.
I love africa's wildlife animals,
I've been working in south africa for some time,
as you can imagine, there are rhinos,
lions,
also girrafes
and all type of animals, I have dealt with all type of animals.
I work both in Spain and abroard
I also do a teaching task,
we give talks at universities in Spain.
With Cunipic we make talks for veterinarians and also for
professionals from the pet sector.
Well, one of my most difficult challenges was to make an ultrasound on a jaguar
which we couldn't give much anesthesia
because she was pregnant,
thats why we couldn't
give her much anesthesia and she was unwilling us to help her
in making an ultrasound.
iIt was very difficult for us, it is very difficult to work with
big animals, with big wild animals that can really hurt you
well they can actually kill you, and its a great challenge
your life is in risk all the time, but thats the name of the game. Animals
are a great part of my life,
I live with animals, I wake up with animals
and
from the moment I get up till the moment I go to bed
my world revolves around animals. What I mostly like of my job is
to be in contact with all type of animals,
and also meeting people from all parts of the world,
it allows me to travel
and my job is marvellous, I can't express it in any other way.
